Name: CosmoDrive: Zero
About the game: CosmoDrive: Zero - is a runner in which you need to avoid randomly generated obstacles. Get through the levels, avoiding different obstacles, and maybe you’ll be able to escape this mysterious world. Features: • Fast paced gameplay • Music • Random level generation.
